long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Muzcorner (Also known as Muzaffarpur Corner) is a local news website that primarily authors articles about Muzaffarpur and other cities of Bihar.

From Muzcorner Extension one can access:

1. Latest Muzaffarpur News
2. Important Productive News from other cities of Bihar
3. Infographics
4. Opinion about Day-to-Day things happening in Bihar

Muzcorner has also its presence on popular social media like Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, YouTube, and LinkedIn by the same name.

One can access its website from https://www.muzcorner.in.

The website was founded in 2018 by an individual named - Sanjay Kumar Monu, who is a native to Muzaffarpur itself.
